title: Ducks To Water
description: The duck pond is dry and Bryn wants to know why.It turns out the drain to the pond is blocked, but what can help shift it?It’s time to get the big crane out for some heavy lifting.Meanwhile, Oscar finds himself in a very strange predicament… An exciting story with a very surprising pop-up at the end.Another beautiful picture book from the author who brought you A Bigger Digger, Stuck in the Muck and Pigs Might Fly.
author: Brett Avison
